quotes.quote: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.
quotes.author: A. J. McLean

quotes.quote: Where words fail, music speaks.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Words make you think a thought. Music makes you feel a feeling. A song makes you feel a thought.
quotes.author: E. Y. Harburg

quotes.quote: Music expresses that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Music should strike fire from the heart of man, and bring tears from the eyes of woman.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Without music, life is a journey through a desert.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: The world's most famous and popular language is music.
quotes.author: Psy

quotes.quote: Music can change the world because it can change people.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Music is the soundtrack of your life.
quotes.author: Dick Clark

quotes.quote: Music doesn't lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: There is geometry in the humming of the strings, there is music in the spacing of the spheres.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the music of reason.
quotes.author: James Joseph Sylvester

quotes.quote: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Music has healing power. It has the ability to take people out of themselves for a few hours.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: A lot of music is mathematics. It's balance.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Music is the universal language of mankind.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.
quotes.author: Christina Milian

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Musicians don't retire; they stop when there's no more music in them.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: Music is life itself. What would this world be without good music? No matter what kind it is.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: I need to listen to chill music when I'm driving. It prevents road rage.
quotes.author: Aaron Paul

quotes.quote: My personal hobbies are reading, listening to music, and silence.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Sometimes I feel like rap music is almost the key to stopping racism.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: I feel like good music comes and goes in waves.
quotes.author: Santigold

quotes.quote: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world.
quotes.author: Damon Albarn

quotes.quote: My music fights against the system that teaches to live and die.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: I write while listening to music, mostly because the world beyond my headphones is too chaotic.
quotes.author: Dean Bakopoulos

quotes.quote: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: You are the music while the music lasts.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: I enjoy everything I do, from music to fashion or to watches - the lifestyle.
quotes.author: J Balvin

quotes.quote: It was my love for the guitar that first got me into music and singing.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: Music is the voice that tells us that the human race is greater than it knows.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: I suffer from deep depression, so my only release is music.
quotes.author: Kevin Gates

quotes.quote: Music is really driving my whole life.
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.quote: All music is escapism for me, but I like the way that, on a good night, that sense of escapism can be shared.
quotes.author: Jamie xx

quotes.quote: My music is the spiritual expression of what I am - my faith, my knowledge, my being.
quotes.author: John Coltrane

quotes.quote: Like sunshine, music is a powerful force that can instantly and almost chemically change your entire mood.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: Of all the music that reached farthest into heaven, it is the beating of a loving heart.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: After silence, that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: I try to apply colors like words that shape poems, like notes that shape music.
quotes.author: Joan Miro

quotes.quote: Music is the silence between the notes.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.quote: When I die, I want people to play my music, go wild and freak out and do anything they want to do.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Music really transcends languages, and it means so much.
quotes.author: RM

quotes.quote: If I make music and people hate it, you know, whatever. I'll die someday, and one day, they will too.
quotes.author: Billie Eilish

quotes.quote: I like playing heavy metal music and pretending I'm a vampire in front of the mirror.
quotes.author: Luke Mably

quotes.quote: Music is art, and making watches is art, too.
quotes.author: J Balvin

quotes.quote: Tones sound, and roar and storm about me until I have set them down in notes.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: The wise musicians are those who play what they can master.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Music is my religion.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: All music is folk music. I ain't never heard a horse sing a song.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: Life is like music; it must be composed by ear, feeling, and instinct, not by rule.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Music is spiritual. The music business is not.
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: Music - it's motivational and just makes you relax.
quotes.author: Taika Waititi

quotes.quote: Music is the strongest form of magic.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Old music used to mean something. There is none of that today.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: Beats succeeded because, as music lovers, we knew oscilloscopes don't buy headphones - people do.
quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

quotes.quote: Where there is devotional music, God is always at hand with His gracious presence.
quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quotes.quote: Cinematography is infinite in its possibilities... much more so than music or language.
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.quote: I mean, the genuine roots of culture is folk music.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: There's a certain line between jokes and music and poetry that's a bit blurred in my mind.
quotes.author: Bo Burnham

quotes.quote: There's sketch, improv, writing, acting, music, and badminton. Those are the seven forms of comedy.
quotes.author: T. J. Miller

quotes.quote: The rhetoric is the key to the character. It's the verbal music of the piece.
quotes.author: Peter Shaffer

quotes.quote: Music comes to me more readily than words.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Music, in performance, is a type of sculpture. The air in the performance is sculpted into something.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: No two people on earth are alike, and it's got to be that way in music or it isn't music.
quotes.author: Billie Holiday

quotes.quote: I lost myself in the bubble of music - driving myself to be a success.
quotes.author: Dan Hill

quotes.quote: Music is the shorthand of emotion.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than live music. It's raw energy, and raw energy feeds the soul.
quotes.author: Dhani Jones

quotes.quote: If I had a free afternoon, I would play music, sit in my backyard, and drink coffee.
quotes.author: Aja Naomi King

quotes.quote: Music is your own experience, your own thoughts, your wisdom.
quotes.author: Charlie Parker

quotes.quote: I would love to be able to pursue music as a career but honestly, I'm just not good enough.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

quotes.quote: Music inflames temperament.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Music has a poetry of its own, and that poetry is called melody.
quotes.author: Joshua Logan

quotes.quote: As a youngster, I never dreamed there could be a career actually earning a living writing music.
quotes.author: John Williams

quotes.quote: Good fashion is like rock music: all anarchy and revolt.
quotes.author: Ann Demeulemeester

quotes.quote: I feel that when you care about your music, taking risks is something you should do to keep things exciting.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: My goal is to be one with the music. I just dedicate my whole life to this art.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Military justice is to justice what military music is to music.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: We're a bit flashy, but the music's not one big noise.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.quote: They teach you there's a boundary line to music. But, man, there's no boundary line to art.
quotes.author: Charlie Parker

quotes.quote: I think I will never stop working with music; it has become a part of who I am.
quotes.author: Martin Garrix

quotes.quote: Rap music is the only vital form of music introduced since punk rock.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: I go with the flow. Whatever music you play for me, I'll dance.
quotes.author: Gael Garcia Bernal

quotes.quote: I like to go to the beach, have a bonfire, and play music.
quotes.author: Colbie Caillat

quotes.quote: Versification is, indeed, indispensable for music, but rhyme, solely for rhyming's sake, most pernicious.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: Hunting, fishing, drawing, and music occupied my every moment. Cares I knew not, and cared naught about them.
quotes.author: John James Audubon

quotes.quote: Clothes are like a good meal, a good movie, great pieces of music.
quotes.author: Michael Kors

quotes.quote: Making music is like shopping for me. Every song is like a new pair of shoes.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: You create a community with music, not just at concerts but by talking about it with your friends.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: I don't know anything about music. In my line you don't have to.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: I love sad songs. They say so much. I love country music but even the happy songs sound really sad.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.quote: My best hostess tip is to have good food and really good music!
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Change is always happening. That's one of the wonderful things about jazz music.
quotes.author: Maynard Ferguson

quotes.quote: My music had roots which I'd dug up from my own childhood, musical roots buried in the darkest soil.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: We came out in the midst of the hippie hangover. All this mellow music.
quotes.author: Angus Young

quotes.quote: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: Music fills the infinite between two souls.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Hawaii is paradise. It sounds cheesy to say it, but there's music in the air there.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: There is nothing stable in the world; uproar's your only music.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: I want people to get positive energy from our music.
quotes.author: Suga

quotes.quote: Pop music, disco music, and heavy metal music is about shutting out the tensions of life, putting it away.
quotes.author: Peter Tork

quotes.quote: People should listen to my music because it's good.
quotes.author: Cardi B

quotes.quote: I love that way dance music can put you in a trance.
quotes.author: Chet Faker

quotes.quote: My heart, which is so full to overflowing, has often been solaced and refreshed by music when sick and weary.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: There are more love songs than anything else. If songs could make you do something we'd all love one another.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Just when you think we're living in a little bit of a divided world, music brings us together.
quotes.author: Luis Fonsi

quotes.quote: Sometimes words are just music themselves. Like 'Chicago' is a very musical sounding author.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: As long as my music is real, it's no limit to how many ears I can grab.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.quote: Music is everybody's possession. It's only publishers who think that people own it.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: If a composer could say what he had to say in words he would not bother trying to say it in music.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Fog and one blue light is all I need in life at the club. Just a dark room and loud music. I'm into that.
quotes.author: Kelela

quotes.quote: Good music will always be recognized in the end.
quotes.author: Suga

quotes.quote: To me, the greatest pleasure of writing is not what it's about, but the inner music that words make.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: If architecture is frozen music then music must be liquid architecture.
quotes.author: Quincy Jones

quotes.quote: I love a lot of different styles, but my heart belongs in electronic music.
quotes.author: John Grant

quotes.quote: Music was invented to confirm human loneliness.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Live music is the cure for what ails ya.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: My music isn't rappity-rap-rap-rap.
quotes.author: Travis Scott

quotes.quote: Music washes away the dust of every day life.
quotes.author: Art Blakey

quotes.quote: We should make decisions in life with our hearts, not our brains, not only in music but in daily life.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.quote: I wanted to prove the sustaining power of music.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: I think that's what it is with rock music. It helps you hang tough, I guess.
quotes.author: Angus Young

quotes.quote: Sometimes, I make music in my sleep. So I get up, put on my headphones, and compose it on the piano.
quotes.author: Adnan Sami

quotes.quote: Music with dinner is an insult both to the cook and the violinist.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Music is well said to be the speech of angels.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: What I love about Christmas music is it stays around every year and comes back.
quotes.author: India Arie

quotes.quote: If I was in a zombie apocalypse, I wouldn't be playing music, because that would attract zombies.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.quote: I associate heavy metal with fantasy because of the tremendous power that the music delivers.
quotes.author: Christopher Lee

quotes.quote: I gravitate towards happy music. I love the Beach Boys.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: It is from the blues that all that may be called American music derives its most distinctive character.
quotes.author: James Weldon Johnson

quotes.quote: I'm addicted to making music, but I don't want to do it forever. I just want a farm. Farms make you happy.
quotes.author: Sam Smith

quotes.quote: People haven't always been there for me, but music always has.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Good music is good music, and everything else can go to hell.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: He has Van Gogh's ear for music.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: When I am stressed, my No. 1 reliever is my music.
quotes.author: Sabrina Bryan

quotes.quote: True music must repeat the thought and inspirations of the people and the time.
quotes.author: George Gershwin

quotes.quote: It feels so good to be amongst some of the biggest legends in music - it feels quite surreal.
quotes.author: Anne-Marie

quotes.quote: The only love affair I have ever had was with music.
quotes.author: Maurice Ravel

quotes.quote: Music is the best means we have of digesting time.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: My music is best understood by children and animals.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: Music is a unifying force.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: You can't stay the same. If you're a musician and a singer, you have to change, that's the way it works.
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: Cocktail music is accepted as audible wallpaper.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: Music is an art that touches the depth of human existence; an art of sounds that crosses all borders.
quotes.author: Daniel Barenboim

quotes.quote: I was bred and raised in a multi-cultural music background.
quotes.author: Coco Lee

quotes.quote: In music the passions enjoy themselves.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Film is one of the three universal languages, the other two: mathematics and music.
quotes.author: Frank Capra

quotes.quote: I'm attached to the beat. The beat speaks words. I love music.
quotes.author: Travis Scott

quotes.quote: Istanbul is inspiring because it has its own code of architecture, literature, poetry, music.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: Sometimes music, movies and books are the only things that let us feel like someone else feels like we do.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Music is my life, it is a reflection of what I go through.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.quote: Music is the expression of the movement of the waters, the play of curves described by changing breezes.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.quote: It's like drinking water. You have to have water every day, and music is like water for me.
quotes.author: Trombone Shorty

quotes.quote: Philosophy is the highest music.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I'm a DJ who makes dance music who got to play with Sting.
quotes.author: Afrojack

quotes.quote: I like to borrow forms and quotes and use a lot of allusions, in both poetry and music.
quotes.author: Jamila Woods

quotes.quote: If you talk bad about country music, it's like saying bad things about my momma. Them's fightin' words.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Your personal history is a part of what happens with your hands and your head as you play music.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.quote: Actually, I hear a lot of rock music. My husband is a big rock fan.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Music is the emotional life of most people.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Hell is full of musical amateurs.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If I was just a fan of music, I would think that I was the number one artist in the world.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: Like music and art, love of nature is a common language that can transcend political or social boundaries.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: I design music; I don't produce it.
quotes.author: Travis Scott

quotes.quote: The roar of the crowd has always been the sweetest music. It's intoxicating.
quotes.author: Vin Scully

quotes.quote: Music is the melody whose text is the world.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The truest expression of a people is in its dances and its music. Bodies never lie.
quotes.author: Agnes de Mille

quotes.quote: Rock and Roll: Music for the neck downwards.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: Dance music is like a virus: it has affected so many different genres.
quotes.author: Avicii

quotes.quote: If you put out quality music, you're always going to be in a good place.
quotes.author: Romeo Santos

quotes.quote: Music for me, it demands full concentration.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: True country music is honesty, sincerity, and real life to the hilt.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: I call architecture frozen music.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.quote: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: My music is not just about entertainment. It is about enlightenment also.
quotes.author: Kailash Kher

quotes.quote: Music is for every single person that walks the planet.
quotes.author: Robert Plant

quotes.quote: I don't like being put in a box. I just make music, you know?
quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

quotes.quote: There's nothing like music to relieve the soul and uplift it.
quotes.author: Mickey Hart

quotes.quote: I like rock music that has melody, but it also makes you wanna get up and dance.
quotes.author: Albert Hammond, Jr.

quotes.quote: The music industry is a matrix that is counter to what is natural and right.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: Music and fashion have to have their own styles. It's a must.
quotes.author: Suga

quotes.quote: The martial music of every sideburned delinquent on the face of the earth.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: When people hear good music, it makes them homesick for something they never had, and never will have.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: I love music videos, I really do. I think it's kind of sad that it's a dying art form.
quotes.author: Adam Levine

quotes.quote: Beethoven can write music, thank God, but he can do nothing else on earth.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Who hears music feels his solitude peopled at once.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Classical music is the kind we keep thinking will turn into a tune.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Music can author the unauthorable and communicate the unknowable.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: Music fathoms the sky.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: If you pour some music on whatever's wrong, it'll sure help out.
quotes.author: Levon Helm

quotes.quote: To sing is to bring to life; impossible if the words are mediocre, however good the music.
quotes.author: Edith Piaf

quotes.quote: Every song is like a painting.
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.quote: Music exists for the purpose of growing an admirable heart.
quotes.author: Shinichi Suzuki

quotes.quote: Music speaks to people in a way that breaks down boundaries that words and actions sometimes can't.
quotes.author: Dan Reynolds

quotes.quote: Citizens of India, Pakistan, and Kashmir need to come together and make music.
quotes.author: Zubin Mehta

quotes.quote: Curtain! Fast music! Light! Ready for the last finale! Great! The show looks good, the show looks good!
quotes.author: Florenz Ziegfeld

quotes.quote: Music is always a creative process that comes from the heart. It's a feeling, a vibration, that we ride on.
quotes.author: Maurice White

quotes.quote: You shouldn't be in the music business if you're posing.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: You just pick up a chord, go twang, and you're got music.
quotes.author: Sid Vicious

quotes.quote: I don't care much about music. What I like is sounds.
quotes.author: Dizzy Gillespie

quotes.quote: Music is there to get you through life's ups and downs, good times and not so good times.
quotes.author: Rob Halford

quotes.quote: I've made sure that in any situation and with any record label, I'm allowed to write my own music.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Nothing can ever be wrong about music.
quotes.author: Duane Allman

quotes.quote: Music is the best way for me to say I love you.
quotes.author: Mireille Mathieu

quotes.quote: I need drama in my life to keep making music.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: I'm not trying to keep up or adapt. I'm allowing myself to grow, evolve and create new music.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: If you want to make beautiful music, you must play the black and the white notes together.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: I am never going to give music up.
quotes.author: Dr. Dre

quotes.quote: Music became a healer for me.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: When words leave off, music begins.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Music played at weddings always reminds me of the music played for soldiers before they go into battle.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: I didn't get interested in music. It was a gift from God.
quotes.author: Nina Simone

quotes.quote: The music is all. People should die for it. People are dying for everything else, so why not the music?
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: We always go out looking for live music after our shows.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: Music has charms to sooth a savage breast, to soften rocks, or bend a knotted oak.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: I was really lucky that I came to puberty at a time when music and politics were completely intertwined.
quotes.author: Bob Geldof

quotes.quote: These are the sort of things that push you on in music - the curiosity, a passion for new ideas.
quotes.author: Elvis Costello

quotes.quote: Music is the embodiment of my soul. When I play, I'm not performing a song: I'm becoming it.
quotes.author: Tash Sultana

quotes.quote: Something about cactuses and rock music is a good combination.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: I felt my music wasn't aiming at anybody. Everything I was doing was because it was a good song.
quotes.author: Glen Campbell

quotes.quote: Music reaches people in a way that simple spoken words just can't.
quotes.author: Sonita Alizadeh

quotes.quote: The thing about good writing is it has a music to it.
quotes.author: Lauren Graham

quotes.quote: Hip-hop is a collage. It samples from all different styles of music.
quotes.author: Kamasi Washington

quotes.quote: Music when healthy, is the teacher of perfect order, and when depraved, the teacher of perfect disorder.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Reading is more of a left-brain process, and listening to music is a right-brain function.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.quote: Christianity helps us face the music even when we don't like the tune.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Composing music is hard work.
quotes.author: John Williams

quotes.quote: I came through folk music simply because it was easy to get into it.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: I just want to make the best music of all time with my best friends.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: My worst fear is my music won't connect with the public.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.quote: If you look deep enough you will see music; the heart of nature being everywhere music.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: I don't have a therapist, so I use me as my own therapist when I'm making the music.
quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

quotes.quote: Music, not sex, got me aroused.
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.quote: I love music, and after my first experience with movies, I can't wait to do more.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: Absolutely, I never stop working on new music.
quotes.author: Shawn Mendes

quotes.quote: Maybe one day there will finally be an education for electronic music.
quotes.author: Afrojack

quotes.quote: Music is intended and designed for sentient beings that have hopes and purposes and emotions.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Our music is never going to stop someone from bullying someone else. But you should be your own person.
quotes.author: Andy Biersack

quotes.quote: I like to go into a little shell and be a hermit and make music for a while.
quotes.author: Delta Goodrem

quotes.quote: The more you play music, the better you'll get.
quotes.author: Glen Campbell

quotes.quote: I had to listen to the classical music because it calms me down, calms my nerves down.
quotes.author: Novak Djokovic

quotes.quote: I enjoy 'down South' music.
quotes.author: Lil Uzi Vert

quotes.quote: You know, when I hear music, I just hear the whole thing.
quotes.author: Meg White

quotes.quote: If you're only a fan of the old music, that music's gonna wind up sounding even older.
quotes.author: Johnny Van Zant

quotes.quote: Well, because music is my life and music is not work for me.
quotes.author: Gunther Schuller

quotes.quote: No good opera plot can be sensible, for people do not sing when they are feeling sensible.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: I always felt rock and roll was very, very wholesome music.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.quote: It's a crazy world, so sports and athletics and music can be a form of escapism.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.quote: Gospel music always relaxes me and calms my nerves.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: Starbucks has changed the rules of engagement for the music industry.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Music's been a huge passion of mine since I was really young. I started playing guitar when I was thirteen.
quotes.author: Lewis Hamilton

quotes.quote: Please write music like Wagner, only louder.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Great music is in the ear of the beholder.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: It's always about the music, never about anything else.
quotes.author: Eddie Van Halen

quotes.quote: Every act, every deed of justice and mercy and benevolence, makes heavenly music in Heaven.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: Music really becomes the soundtrack to the major events to your life.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: Music can't change the world.
quotes.author: Bob Geldof

quotes.quote: I like being in a recording studio. I like watching a song go from the simplicity of the original music.
quotes.author: Grace Slick

quotes.quote: Most of my music videos were made for under $200.
quotes.author: Grimes

quotes.quote: I titled the album Reflections because I am reflecting on my music career.
quotes.author: Miriam Makeba

quotes.quote: Music is love in search of a word.
quotes.author: Sidney Lanier

quotes.quote: I love what I do: there is no pressure. The music doesn't like pressure.
quotes.author: Burning Spear

quotes.quote: But what was my motivation was music, and the fact that I love to move around. I'm always moving around.
quotes.author: Suzanne Farrell

quotes.quote: If I read or listened to critics of our music, I'd have been discouraged a long time ago.
quotes.author: Graham Nash

quotes.quote: Preparing for a future in music is an expensive proposition.
quotes.author: Itzhak Perlman

quotes.quote: You must play for the love of music. Perfect technique is not as important as making music from the heart.
quotes.author: Mstislav Rostropovich

quotes.quote: Music's staying power is a function of how timeless the lyrics, song and production are.
quotes.author: Gary Wright

quotes.quote: The visuals are equally as important as the music. It's all a complete experience.
quotes.author: Andra Day

quotes.quote: Whatever I've got going on, I play music to accompany me.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.quote: I believe that great success is possible in any field - from music to mathematics to macro trading.
quotes.author: Paul Tudor Jones

quotes.quote: Music should always be an adventure.
quotes.author: Coleman Hawkins

quotes.quote: Music was my oxygen. It's what saved me from being a really lonely and scared teenager.
quotes.author: Corey Hart

quotes.quote: Creating music is a wonderful way to celebrate our devotion for Lord Shiva.
quotes.author: Amish Tripathi

quotes.quote: If you think about it, everything we do in life is set to some kind of music.
quotes.author: Peabo Bryson

quotes.quote: Most people can't see beauty and love. I see our music as medicine.
quotes.author: Maurice White

quotes.quote: In my mind, my music is kind of inseparable from my hometown and my life growing up.
quotes.author: Drew Holcomb

quotes.quote: More than art, more than literature, music is universally accessible.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: With Led Zeppelin, it has always been that mystique of how the music is done - how it works, why it works.
quotes.author: Jimmy Page

quotes.quote: When I went to see Kansas and Queen and Styx, I don't even remember the music. But I know what I saw.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: Music gives us new energy and a stronger sense of purpose.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: As you grow older, your music begins to mature and grow older along with you.
quotes.author: Zendaya

quotes.quote: The people who know nothing about music are the ones always talking about it.
quotes.author: Nat King Cole

quotes.quote: Music happens to be an art form that transcends language.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: I write my own music. By myself, on a computer, I program guitar and piano.
quotes.author: Christina Grimmie

quotes.quote: I see music as fluid architecture.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: Music comes from a place we don't know.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: Music is nothing else but wild sounds civilized into time and tune.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: We will miss George for his sense of love, his sense of music and his sense of laughter.
quotes.author: Ringo Starr

quotes.quote: My father loved all different types of music. He wasn't a snob. He wasn't a purist.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: There's no religion but sex and music.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.quote: I think music should be the basis of an education, not just something you do once a week.
quotes.author: Joshua Bell

quotes.quote: I have no technical training and am completely uneducated in music.
quotes.author: Sade Adu

quotes.quote: Music commands how we feel, dictates what we experience in our feelings.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: My music is about the journey, about love and the human experience.
quotes.author: Wynonna Judd

quotes.quote: My darlings, if I can't write dark, epic music, I can't live!
quotes.author: Amy Lee

quotes.quote: What the future of the planet and music and art and all of it is sharing; it's diversity.
quotes.author: Taj Mahal

quotes.quote: Rock music is electronic music, dependent entirely on electronic circuitry and amplification.
quotes.author: John Frusciante

quotes.quote: I believe that music is connected by human passions and curiosities rather than by marketing strategies.
quotes.author: Elvis Costello

quotes.quote: If you have some magical chemistry that actually find the music you make compelling, that is a big bonus.
quotes.author: Geddy Lee

quotes.quote: I found music to be the therapy of choice. I guess it is for a lot of people.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: Music should be your escape.
quotes.author: Missy Elliott

quotes.quote: Working on music is the funnest thing for me, and I love it, and I could do it all day, all night.
quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

quotes.quote: Musicians own music because music owns them.
quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

quotes.quote: I've played music that's terrible in the past, and not everyone likes you, which is fine.
quotes.author: Tash Sultana

quotes.quote: I just have this real love and connection with what I'm doing when I play music.
quotes.author: Tash Sultana

quotes.quote: I'm no different than any other human being. I play music for a living, and we're very blessed.
quotes.author: Zac Brown

quotes.quote: I guess a good song is a good song is a good song, ya know.
quotes.author: George Thorogood

quotes.quote: You have the sun, you have the moon, you have the air that you breathe - and you have the Rolling Stones!
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than lifting somebody's spirit with music.
quotes.author: Darlene Love

quotes.quote: I grew up playing music and enjoying good food, friends and family in my own backyard.
quotes.author: Rodney Atkins

quotes.quote: My music is constantly changing because I am. I'm writing it and changing as I'm writing.
quotes.author: Anne-Marie

quotes.quote: Music assists him in the use of harmonic and mathematical proportion.
quotes.author: Vitruvius

quotes.quote: Music is part of history, and our history has lessons that cannot be separated from our greatest music.
quotes.author: Mstislav Rostropovich

quotes.quote: Music is only love looking for words.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: I'm very eclectic in my music tastes - anything from Nina Simone to Beethoven to Talvin Singh.
quotes.author: Monica Ali

quotes.quote: Music is very spiritual, it has the power to bring people together.
quotes.author: Edgar Winter

quotes.quote: I'm pretty much open to anyone who's unique and has mutual appreciation in the music as BTS.
quotes.author: Suga

quotes.quote: The iPod completely changed the way people approach music.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: I think often sadness is a great place to get songs from.
quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

quotes.quote: 'Music Hop' in 1963 was my first hosting job of a variety program.
quotes.author: Alex Trebek

quotes.quote: It just happens to be that people like to associate poetry and rap music. I think that idea is kind of corny.
quotes.author: Earl Sweatshirt

quotes.quote: Music is the fourth great material want, first food, then clothes, then shelter, then music.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The real art of conducting consists in transitions.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Music is forever; music should grow and mature with you, following you right on up until you die.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: We all love musical architecture; there's no doubt about that.
quotes.author: Levon Helm

quotes.quote: Long intros are cool because there's a little bit of anticipation, you know?
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: Every language has its own music.
quotes.author: Sid Caesar

quotes.quote: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: I look at you and I write down what I hear.
quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

quotes.quote: I wake up in the morning, I do a little stretching exercises, pick up the horn and play.
quotes.author: Herb Alpert

quotes.quote: There's nothing like a good cheating song to make me want to run home to be with my wife.
quotes.author: Steven Curtis Chapman

quotes.quote: Sometimes before we make a record I go back and listen to a few. It's equally humbling and uplifting.
quotes.author: Michael Stipe

quotes.quote: That was when I realised that music is the most profound, magical form of communication there is.
quotes.author: Lesley Garrett

quotes.quote: All music is beautiful.
quotes.author: Billy Strayhorn

quotes.quote: Writing about music is like dancing about architecture.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: I was growing up listening to Queen. Freddie Mercury threw those incredible melodies into his songs.
quotes.author: Gary Cherone

quotes.quote: Everywhere in the world, music enhances a hall, with one exception: Carnegie Hall enhances the music.
quotes.author: Isaac Stern

quotes.quote: You can never get silence anywhere nowadays, have you noticed?
quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

quotes.quote: Secretly, I wanted to look like Jimi Hendrix, but I could never quite pull it off.
quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

quotes.quote: But when you get music and words together, that can be a very powerful thing.
quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

quotes.quote: You know, all my songs are relatives, brothers, sisters, cousins.
quotes.author: David Coverdale

quotes.quote: My father used to sing to me in my mother's womb. I think I can author about any tune in two beats.
quotes.author: Yancy Butler

quotes.quote: Music is a performance and needs the audience.
quotes.author: Michael Tippett

quotes.quote: Music is always changing and the changes are unpredictable.
quotes.author: Billy Sheehan

quotes.quote: Any good music must be an innovation.
quotes.author: Les Baxter

quotes.quote: My music, my songs are 100 percent inspired by girl power.
quotes.author: Paulina Rubio

quotes.quote: Music's not like becoming a doctor, who can walk into a community and find people who need him.
quotes.author: Charlie Byrd

quotes.quote: Composers shouldn't think too much - it interferes with their plagiarism.
quotes.author: Howard Dietz
